name: New Firefox Browser UI Kit 2021
description:
Introducing an unofficial and fresh new Firefox Browser UI Kit for Figma.


This kit will help you to:

  • Supercharge your presentation.
  • A great file to start designing Firefox theme or you want to improve Firefox browser design.


This mockup features:

  • 100% desktop browser mockups with vector shapes and fully editable URLs and favicon.
  • Fully resizable and reusable as a component library.
  • Support Figma auto layout.
  • SOON â€“ The mobile version!


View the old version of Firefox here.
